# The same version as Felix's but with a tidyverse/tidymodels 

# loading libraries
# install.packages(tidyverse)
# install.packages(tidymodels)

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(tidymodels)

data<-read_csv("Felix/Insurance/Insurance Fraud/insurance_claims.csv")
head(data)
# summary stats in a "nice" format
skim(data)

# conversion is needed for several variables to factors
data<-data %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character) & !c(policy_bind_date, incident_date, incident_location), as_factor))
 
skim(data)
